name: Wanted (edward4hands)
description:
Submission for The Dream Arcade Archive jam

The demon hunter has finally tracked down an archangel. Will the angel over come this evil, or will he meet his end. 

The choices you make will determine how the story unfolds, so choose wisely and aim for a high score. Game was built over the course of a week and marks my first game jam.

GAMEPLAY

left and right arrows

-Find all collectibles and unlock Party Mode

-Secret hidden passageway

-Get a high score and see how the story plays out

Known Issues

-glitch with text on last level.

-double choice collision when not in fullscreen

Art/Programming- Me

Music- Jake Cervetto

Thanks for playing.
